attributes.action: Stop the privatisation of the Post Office and use its organisation to set up a High Street People's Bank.
attributes.additional_details: High Street banking needs to be taken out of the hands of bankers and using the basis of the Post Office organisation to set up a basic People's Bank under the auspices of the british government but protected from interference, on a day to day basis, by elected politicians would give the british people an opportunity to remove the risk of being royally screwed by the bunch of dishonest bankers, who are protected by our elected representatives from prosecution for their criminal activity, in charge of the international banking system at the moment.
